doc.after: There is a great deal of Lithuanian literature written in Latin the main scholarly language of the Middle Ages The edicts of the Lithuanian King Mindaugas is the prime example of the literature of this kind Letters of Gediminas is another crucial heritage of the Lithuanian Latin writings
